Comment: This is the first correspondence chess game that I have won. Looking back, it was actually shorter than I remember it.

At the time, this was my favorite opening as Black, a variation of the Hippopotamus Opening. It allows White a good control over the center and Black good defense and a castled King with hopes of counter-attack on the center.
